mapper.insert: INSERT INTO problem(id, creatorID, createTime, name, level, content, example, expectation, extra, timeLimit, memoryLimit) VALUES (#{id}, #{creatorID}, #{createTime}, #{name}, #{level}, #{content}, #{example}, #{expectation}, #{extra}, #{timeLimit}, #{memoryLimit})
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, serial, level FROM problem;
SELECT id, name, serial, level FROM problem WHERE creatorID = #{creatorID};
SELECT id, serial, createTime, name, level, content FROM problem;
SELECT id, example, expectation, extra, timeLimit, memoryLimit FROM problem;
